Artist Statement 1: (See story for today.) Sometimes I get stuck in my ways. Do I need a new vision? Do I long for it? What must I do to long for it. Sometimes we need to see a glipmse of someone living life in a way that is enough to knock us out of our ways.
Art title 2: A Million Facets of God's love
Artist Statement 2: Sometimes I forget that the same God that is kind and warm is also the one who disciplines. I imagine he embodies the different types of love all the people in my life give me. He invented and lives all of the healthy types.
excerpt:
Tad, age 25 yelled at his 35 year old brother, "You need help tying your shoes again?!" Tad looked impatiently at his watch, crouched and snatched Brett's laces from him. "We're late for church, dude."

Brett looked at Tad, concerned, "I thought we go to church to learn to be 

nice."Brett looked at Tad's pants, so tight they were stretching at the seems. "You can borrow some of my pants if you want to, brother." 

"No offense," Tad said. "but I wouldn't be caught dead in your pants." Brett

 looked down at his pants and said, "I wish I didn't have to wear pants." ...
